mapper.select: select k.seckill_id, k.user_phone, k.create_time, k.state, s.seckill_id "seckill.seckill_id", s.name "seckill.name", s.number "seckill.number", s.start_time "seckill.start_time", s.end_time "seckill.end_time", s.create_time "seckill.create_time" from success_killed k inner join seckill s on k.seckill_id=s.seckill_id where k.seckill_id = #{seckillId} and k.user_phone=#{userPhone}
